name: Lonely Planet Banff, Jasper & Glacier National Park 5th Ed.
categories: Banff, Jasper& Glacier National Park 5th Ed.
description: From snow-capped mountains to glaciers to valleys and lakes, this guidebook will help you experience everything Banff, Jasper and Glacier National Parks have to offer. Full-colour maps and images help plan your trip, and insider tips and reviews point you in the direction of restaurants and attractions that suit your budget.

Author: Gregor Clark, Michael Grosberg, Craig McLachlan
